entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 06:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Fog dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
